metadata.description: In a blink of an eye, their world has changed, with the oppressive New Order declaring all magic as evil incarnate! In this action-packed first issue spinning out of best-selling author James Pattersons's #1 novel, sibling teenagers Whit & Wisty Allgood use their newly discovered magical powers to infiltrate into enemy territory of the New Order to gain control of the inter-dimensional Shadowland. Witch & Wizard takes best-selling author James Pattersons' hit characters from the Witch & Wizard novel on all-new exciting adventures.
metadata.name: James Patterson's: Witch & Wizard
